pr_title: [lcn] Make auto discovery use segment id and module id for ThingID

timeline.message:
Reference modules by segment id and module/group id instead of serial
number. Serial number is used as representation property.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Weiler <toweosp@gmail.com>

NPE corrected when adding lcn group.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Weiler <toweosp@gmail.com>

Corrected ThingTypeUID identification.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Weiler <toweosp@gmail.com>

timeline.body:
Add leading zeros to achieve sortable Thing IDs.
```suggestion
                            String thingID = String.format("S%03dM%03d", addr.getSegmentId(), addr.getModuleId());
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Add leading zeros to achieve sortable Thing IDs.

Suggested change
String thingID = String.format("S%dM%d", addr.getSegmentId(), addr.getModuleId());
String thingID = String.format("S%03dM%03d", addr.getSegmentId(), addr.getModuleId());
